name: Xucharia: The Killer Doll
description:
XUCHARIA IS A PSYCHOLOGICAL TERROR GAME FIRST PERSON, THE GAME TELLS THE SAD STORY, IN WHICH A FAMILY IS DESTROYED BY AN EVIL FORCE.The game has for its protagonist; a 10-year-old girl named Luiza. Luiza gets a doll for her birthday, her parents are very happy with the joy the girl felt after getting a doll from Xucham.What Abner and Prietta did not know! was that the doll was actually a host to a cursed ghost, and at the beginning of the game the ghost takes their life.A sad end awaits this family, who live in isolation in a small town in the interior of São Paulo.

A sad end awaits this family, who live in isolation in a small town in the interior of São Paulo.And you the player have a mission to change this cruel fate!

#horror #indie #survivor #game_horror #Netzado #MarcosDS
